title.narrative: DRG LER II (Large) - Gender Based Violence (GBV) Learning Agenda

description.narrative: The Democracy Human Rights and Governance Learning, Evaluation and Research (DRG-LER II) award continues to advance learning, evaluation, and research within the DRG sector as well as provide critical data on the impact of USAID's DRG activities in the field. Findings from this activity support USAID Mission project evaluation goals and the implementation of the DRG Learning Agenda - an effort to build empirical evidence that tests the theories of change guiding USAID's DRG projects. The Learning Agenda informs future programming choices by DCHA/DRG and the worldwide cadre. DRG-LER II also contributes to USAID's unique role as the leading bilateral donor for DRG activities worldwide. .

participating-org.narrative: NORC at the University of Chicago
